title: Can ADHD cause a vigorous appetite? - Quora

response.answer_text: A “vigorous appetite”? ADHD can present difficulty with “putting on the brakes.” And that can include food. This blog post covers two research papers that associate untreated ADHD with obesity. Can ADHD Make You Fat? - ADHD Roller Coaster with Gina Pera I hope this helps. Gina

Yes. Initially this will increase the appetite. As the time passes the metabolic rate will start dropping. At that stage it will cause very poor appetite. Read more about how metabolic rate effects vital organs of the body. Read my Quora profile for undated information.
Probably not while you’re on the meds, but if you under-eat or fast while you’re on the meds you could feel compelled to eat a lot when the meds wear off.
Yes! Especially when medication is worn off. I personally, am a garbage disposal when meds Ware off
